headline: Yum! Brands Well-Positioned to Beat Market's EBIT Forecast for 2025, Oppenheimer Says
summary: Yum! Brands (YUM) seems well-positioned to achieve its core earnings before interest and taxes growth target of more than 8% for 2025, exceeding the market's 7% estimate, as the consensus underestimates the company's potential for accelerating global same-store sales growth, Oppenheimer said in a note Monday.
